channel.title: John C. Russell

item.title: Thanks for dropping by
item.description: Thanks for checking out my new website. I’m just getting started with building it so I hope you’ll check back in the next few months as I post stuff here.

item.title: About
item.description: I’m a Ph.D. student in applied physics at Harvard University in the Hekstra lab.
